items.title: We’re a Long Way from October 6
items.description: Israel is now the military hegemon in the region, and Hamas is a shadow of its former self.

items.title: Colorado Is Still as Confused on Free Speech as It Is on Gender
items.description: The Supreme Court appears skeptical of laws restricting therapists from counseling against gender transitions.

items.title: To Fix the Deficit, Start with Bloated ‘Disability’ Programs
items.description: Cutting spending is always hard, so conservatives should focus on the least deserving recipients no matter what walk of life they are in.

items.title: Trump Should Use His Tariff Instincts to Lower Drug Prices
items.description: The president has an opportunity to pressure foreign leaders into delivering a fair prescription drug market for Americans.
